General.Name: Axion Ventures Inc
General.Description: Axion Ventures Inc., an investment issuer, primarily focuses on investments in the online video gaming and other information technology sectors in China and internationally. It is involved in the game software development, game operation, provision of outsourcing services, software licensing, and software training businesses. The company was formerly known as Capstream Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Axion Ventures Inc. in March 2017. Axion Ventures Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1S8
